text: Saint-Maurice is the capital of the district of Saint-Maurice in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. On 1 January 2013, the former municipality of Mex (VS) merged into the municipality of Saint-Maurice. It is the site of the Roman outpost of Agaunum and the old Abby of Saint-Maurice, which has become a famous high school in Switzerland (Coll√®ge de Saint-Maurice). It is not St. Moritz, a ski resort in the east part of Switzerland. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Saint-Maurice Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Saint-Maurice, Switzerland
